Title: Nutrition Show(Dev-wow)
Description:
This is a little daily tool about nutrition. You can find the content of the given food, find more nutrient food which you would chosen when you don't know what should be eat today, and find less calorie food for women on diet.

This project can be extended as family show project of Silverlight. Such as editing food information, adding other foods, or a little calculator etc.
HomeWiki:
This is a little daily tool about nutrition. You can find the content of the given food, find more nutrient food which you would chosen when you don't know what should be eat today, and find less calorie food for women on diet.

I have not Vista environment, so can't made gadget. Please inform me when you meet problems during making gadget.

This project can be extended as family show project of Silverlight. Such as editing food information, adding other foods, or a little calculator etc.

You can visit the demo http://www.jieliangjia.cn/nutritionshow/index.html
